text: Novotroyevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Nordovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 6 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Meleuz, 15 km from Nordovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Novotroyevka, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
